Operating System Support: Windows   OS X   Unix like   Morph OS
Description: Has a built in tracker and announcement service
Uses  Mono Project Mono  for cross platform support (.NET)

IPv6: yes  (IPv4 and IPv6 have separate binaries and processes that do not share any information between them. If a client communicates to the tracker over IPv6 it will only receive IPv6 addresses in the response.)
Description: Uses libowfat performs well even on  embedded hardware . Only requirement is a  POSIX  compliant  Operating system OS . Supports only a compact peer list.
Extremely lightweight and efficient  BitTorrent (protocol) BitTorrent  tracker. Supports  SQLite3  and  MySQL  for storage.

Operating System Support: Windows   OS X   Linux   Android (operating system) Android
Description: Does not have a list of hosted torrents.

Operating System Support: Windows   OS X   Unix like   OS/2
Description: Lightweight. Supports DHT PEX announcements via UDP. Does not have a web interface or list of hosted torrents; it is not designed for secure or large scale application.
Vuze  (formerly Azureus) has a built in tracker.
Uses  MySQL  for data storage lightweight tracker
